title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 701.3 - Hearing officer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 701.3 - Hearing officer

State Regulations

All adjudicatory proceeding shall be conducted by a hearing
officer who shall have the power and authority of hearing officers as set forth
in the State Administrative Procedure Act, Labor Law and any other pertinent
statutes and regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
701.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
